search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Gravity Forms (gravity-forms.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text:
The official pricing page for Gravity Forms is:

[https://www.gravityforms.com/pricing/](https://www.gravityforms.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Pricing | WordPress Form Builder Plugin | Gravity Forms

extracted_content.content:
Get started with Gravity Forms today.
-------------------------------------

No matter which level you choose, your web forms are about to pick up some serious momentum. Level up with a Pro account to unlock more Add-Ons, or join our Elite crew for premium Add-Ons, priority support, and more.

 

Basic License
-------------

**$59** per year [Buy Now](https://gravityforms.chargifypay.com/subscribe/kg49bqhvsd4g/gravity-forms-basic?c)

*   **1 Site**
*   Standard Support

**Basic License** includes...

*   HubSpot Add-On
*   Mailchimp Add-On
*   Active Campaign Add-On
*   Campaign Monitor Add-On
*   [See all Add-Ons included...](https://www.gravityforms.com/pricing/#basic)

 

Elite License
-------------

**$259** per year [Buy Now](https://gravityforms.chargifypay.com/subscribe/7cmh48qz2wph/gravity-forms-elite?c)

*   **Unlimited Sites**
*   Priority Support
*   WordPress Multisite

**Elite License** includes...

*   User Registration Add-On
*   Conversational Forms
*   Coupons Add-On
*   Partial Entries Add-On
*   Polls Add-On
*   Signature Add-On
*   Survey Add-On
*   [See all Add-Ons included...](https://www.gravityforms.com/pricing/#elite)

_All our Add-Ons are included with Elite!_

 

Pro License
-----------

**$159** per year [Buy Now](https://gravityforms.chargifypay.com/subscribe/5f4d8645wq49/gravity-forms-pro?c)

*   **3 Sites**
*   Standard Support

**Pro License** includes...

*   Stripe Add-On
*   Dropbox Add-On
*   Square Add-On
*   Zapier Add-On
*   Trello Add-On
*   PayPal Add-On
*   [See all Add-Ons included..](https://www.gravityforms.com/pricing/#pro)

### Unsure what License is best for you?

Visit our [Basic](https://www.gravityforms.com/basic-license-plan/), [Pro](https://www.gravityforms.com/pro-license-plan/), and [Elite](https://www.gravityforms.com/elite-license-plan/) license pages to find out which Add-Ons and features come with each plan.

![Image 1: Gravity Forms](https://s38924.pcdn.co/wp-content/themes/gfcom-voyager/dist/images/logo-black.svg) The #1 Form Builder for WordPress.

Support Level Included

Standard Standard Priority

Basic Add-Ons available with a Basic, Pro, and Elite license.

Frequently Asked Questions.
---------------------------

What is Gravity Forms?Gravity Forms is a plugin for WordPress. It allows you to quickly create data collection forms, polls and surveys for your WordPress website. [This article](https://docs.gravityforms.com/what-is-this-charge-on-my-credit-card/) explains more, or refer to our [home page](https://www.gravityforms.com/).

What are the requirements to run Gravity Forms?Refer to [this article](https://docs.gravityforms.com/gravity-form-system-requirements/).

Please note: If your site is hosted by the WordPress.com service you will need to be on their Business plan, with a custom domain configured and the [Hello Dolly plugin](https://wordpress.org/plugins/hello-dolly/) installed, before they will allow you to install Gravity Forms.

Where can I get custom development?Check out [this article](https://docs.gravityforms.com/custom-development/) for guidance around who to work with on a custom development project.

Do you have a trial version?We do not have any trial version, but we do offer the following resources to help interested prospective purchasers:  
– full [user documentation](https://docs.gravityforms.com/)  
– a fully-functioning [online demo](https://www.gravityforms.com/gravity-forms-demo/)  
– reviewable [Terms of Service](https://www.gravityforms.com/terms-and-conditions/)  
– a talented team of Support Engineers via our [contact us form](https://www.gravityforms.com/contact-us/).

How can I submit a feature request? When will you have feature X?We have a selection of proposed features that are either open for comment or voting to all active Gravity Forms license holders. Go to Gravity Forms Support page, and then choose “View Our Roadmap” to navigate to the [Feature Roadmap page](https://www.gravityforms.com/gravity-forms-roadmap/).

You can vote or comment on ideas listed there, or raise your own request via the (+) button at the bottom left.

Will Gravity Forms work with my Theme?We can’t ensure that Gravity Forms will work with all available themes for WordPress. We code Gravity Forms using WordPress best practices and can ensure that Gravity Forms works with the latest Twenty \* themes (Twenty Nineteen, Twenty Twenty, etc.) from Automattic.

Any theme which follows WordPress best practices should be fine. However, if there is an issue when using Gravity Forms with your theme, we will ask you to activate a default WordPress theme (one of the Twenty \* themes) and see if the issue persists. If it does not, you will need to contact the author of your theme for troubleshooting.

Try Our Demo.
-------------

Not ready to commit? Sign up for a demo and explore how Gravity Forms can take your site to new heights.

Install and start using the best WordPress form plugin now! Gravity Forms provides the most trusted online form creator, built with your websites in mind.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Gravity Forms does not offer a free trial or free tier but provides extensive documentation and a demo for evaluation.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Includes essential features and add-ons for single site usage.
Offers additional add-ons and support for up to three sites.
Provides premium features, unlimited sites, and priority support.
